== Oriontu ==

A theme based on <nowiki>[[http://www.gnome-look.org/content/show.php/Orion(aurora)?content=71909|Orion]]</nowiki> for the Aurora engine.
I used the Human iconset and the <nowiki>[[http://art4linux.org/node/563|Carbonit]]</nowiki> theme for the windows borders.
